submission:
from collections import defaultdict

class Solution:
    def maximumLength(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        indexes = defaultdict(list)
        dp = [0]*n
        ans = 0
        for i in range(n):
            indexes[nums[i]] += [i]
            dp[i] = len(indexes[nums[i]])
            ans = max(ans, dp[i])
        
        for _ in range(k):
            dp2 = list(dp)
            mx = -1
            oi = defaultdict(int)
            for i in range(n):
                if i > 0:
                    mx = max(mx, dp[i-1])
                dp2[i] = max(dp2[i], mx + 1, oi[nums[i]] + 1)
                oi[nums[i]] = max(oi[nums[i]], dp2[i])
            dp = list(dp2)
            ans = max(ans, max(dp))
        return ans
